MeterString.description: Common properties you might use for a string meter. All general meter options are valid.

Text.description: Text to display. If MeasureName is specified, Text will default to the value of the measure.

FontWeight.description: How thin or bold this meter's font should appear. 100 = Hairline, 400 = Normal, 950 = Ultra Black

StringAlign.description: The string will be aligned using the values of the X and or Y settings as the anchor point. So to CenterCenter align a string within a meter with a width and height of 100, set X=50, Y=50 and StringAlign=CenterCenter

StringCase.description: Converts the string to a case.

StringEffect.description: Converts the string to a case.
